SELECT m.*, COALESCE(r.review_count, 0) AS review_count, COALESCE(r.total_member_rate, 0) AS total_member_rate FROM movie m LEFT JOIN ( SELECT movie_id, COUNT(id) AS review_count, SUM(member_rate) AS total_member_rate FROM oneline_review GROUP BY movie_id ) r ON m.id = r.movie_id WHERE YEAR(m.release_date) = YEAR(CURDATE()) ORDER BY m.audi_acc desc LIMIT 10;

SELECT m.*, COALESCE(r.review_count, 0) AS review_count, COALESCE(r.total_member_rate, 0) AS total_member_rate FROM movie m LEFT JOIN ( SELECT movie_id, COUNT(id) AS review_count, SUM(member_rate) AS total_member_rate FROM oneline_review GROUP BY movie_id ) r ON m.id = r.movie_id WHERE m.release_date > CURDATE() ORDER BY m.release_date LIMIT 10;
